roleset.name: initiate with humiliating tasks

example.name: passive
example.text: A navy vet told me abt getting " shellback " , which i think means that you 've crossed the equator . but before receiving the title you get hazed *T*. i do nt

roleset.note: HAZE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from haze.01-v)
